text: we had to bring it up to the elevators
and the problem that we ran into was
that the elevators are very small here
it built back in the 30s and the
dimension of the width of the elevator
doors only 36 inches only 56 inches deep
so we had to we actually built an
elevator back in dearborn to simulate
the size that we have to cut the car
into to get it up the 86th observation
deck the difference in this car in the
current 50 years ago was a size and they
were able to build a cadet car in four
pieces where we had to cut this car in
the basic structure in six pieces to be
able to fit in the elevator so that was
really the only difference the process
was pretty close to the same I was just
measuring it and cutting it and fitting
it in our elevator
